Trade/Device Name(s): VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin A1c Program
VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin Testing System With CDM 4.0
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin Testing System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Cation exchange high performance liquid chromatography
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin A1c Program utilizing HPLC and CDM 4.0 software for determination of HbA1c in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for percent determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood to monitor long-term glucose control in individuals with diabetes mellitus; for professional in vitro diagnostic use
